wuNBFc7f5WiOYopnVtQysw.text: We were offered a discounted price for the all you can eat breakfast at this restaurant attached to the Double Tree Hilton hotel as part of our stay.  The breakfast selection was surprisingly good and the staff was very prompt.

photos.caption: Photo of Bread Street Brasserie - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

g_7mrx6gKoS5EiMeC7jSHA.text: For nearly 14, I'd expect a tasty breakfast. Instead you get typical hot breakfast hotel fare with mediocre coffee and just enough "traditional Scottish" breakfast items to pretend you're getting an experience.

HekkIHaQHgojZ69UYoMNMw.text: My guacamole & pomegranate entree was really quite nice, but everything else was a disappointment... at best. The bread was stale and inedible. My main (a quinoa salad) literally had ROTTING artichoke in it. You could smell it across the table. After letting the waitress know, all we got was a cursory "sorry". Thank god they had an (overpriced) dram of Oban whisky.

Q-grt4JvTf03FyAyRLqtAQ.text: Amazing food in the restaurant of The Point Hotel. Very impressed with the food and service.
